Description: Model granary, made of wood, with seven divisions for grain, stair and figure at one side; Hieratic text on each division.
Curator's comments: Published: Budge. The Mummy (1925). Pl. VI, 2. Budge, By Nile and Tigris, I, 94. Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt, Japan 1999-2000, [127].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rt Hon Francis Wallace Grenfell, 1st Baron Grenfell of Kilvey
